Package it.polimi.ingsw.GameModel.BoardElements

Class PawnContainer<T extends BoardPiece>

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.GameModel.BoardElements.BoardPiece
it.polimi.ingsw.GameModel.BoardElements.BoardPieceWithOwner
it.polimi.ingsw.GameModel.BoardElements.BoardPieceWithOwnerMutable
it.polimi.ingsw.GameModel.BoardElements.PawnContainer<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of the pawns contained, extends BoardPiece
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
StudentContainer, TowerContainer
public abstract class PawnContainer<T extends BoardPiece> extends BoardPieceWithOwnerMutable
Abstract class to model a section of the board which contains students or towers

  • Constructor Details

    • PawnContainer

      public PawnContainer(Player player, int maxPawns)
      Creates PawnContainer with owner and maxPawns
      Parameters:
      player - the owner of the container
      maxPawns - the maximum number of pawns the container can hold

  • Method Details

    • placePawn

      public void placePawn(T pawn) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Places pawn in container. Throws exception if the container is already full, or if the pawn is already inside the container.
      Parameters:
      pawn - the pawn to be placed
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException

    • placePawns

      public void placePawns(List<T> pawns) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Wrapper that calls placePawn() over all the pawns in the given list.
      Parameters:
      pawns - list of pawns to be placed inside this container
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException

    • removePawn

      public boolean removePawn(T pawnToRemove)
      Removes and return pawn from container
      Parameters:
      pawnToRemove - pawn to be removed
      Returns:
      true if the pawn was removed successfully, false otherwise

    • removePawnByID

      public T removePawnByID(int ID)
      Alternative method to remove a pawn from a container referencing it by its ID
      Parameters:
      ID - the ID of the pawn to remove
      Returns:
      the freshly removed pawn

    • removePawn

      public T removePawn()
      Removes the first pawn in the list if present
      Returns:
      the removed pawn, null if no pawn was contained

    • pawnCount

      public int pawnCount()
      Returns:
      the number of pawns currently contained

    • getMaxPawns

      public int getMaxPawns()
      Getter for the max number of pawns this container can hold

    • getPawns

      protected List<T> getPawns()
      Getter for the list, given through a copy; grants subclasses access to the list to perform operations through a copy. Modification is restricted to the public PlaceAndRemove operations
      Returns:
      A new list, containing references to the pawns inside the container

    • getPawnIDs

      public List<Integer> getPawnIDs()
      Getter for a list of IDs of pawns contained in the PawnContainer
      Returns:
      A new list of Integers containing the IDs

    • getPawnByID

      public T getPawnByID(int ID)
